content.name: real_closed_interval
content.prop: real_closed_interval a b = {p. real_less_eq a p & real_less_eq p b}

content.name: integrable_on
content.prop: integrable_on f i = ?y. has_integral f y i

content.name: integral
content.prop: (integral i f = y) = has_integral f y i

content.name: integrable_integral
content.prop: integrable_on f i --> has_integral f (integral i f) i

content.name: has_integral_integrable
content.prop: has_integral f i s --> integrable_on f s

content.name: has_integral_integral
content.prop: integrable_on f s = has_integral f (integral s f) s

content.name: has_integral_unique
content.prop: has_integral f k1 i & has_integral f k2 i --> k1 = k2

content.name: integral_unique
content.prop: has_integral f y k --> integral k f = y

content.name: has_integral_integrable_integral
content.prop: has_integral f i s = (integrable_on f s & integral s f = i)

content.name: integral_eq_has_integral
content.prop: integrable_on f s --> ((integral s f = y) = has_integral f y s)

content.name: has_integral_is_0
content.prop: (!x. member x s --> f x = 0) --> has_integral f 0 s

content.name: has_integral_0
content.prop: has_integral (%x. 0) 0 s

content.name: has_integral_0_eq
content.prop: has_integral (%x. 0) i s = (i = 0)

content.name: has_integral_cmul
content.prop: has_integral f k s --> has_integral (%x. c * f x) (c * k) s

content.name: has_integral_neg
content.prop: has_integral f k s --> has_integral (%x. -(f x)) (-k) s

content.name: has_integral_add
content.prop: has_integral f k s & has_integral g l s --> has_integral (%x. f x + g x) (k + l) s

content.name: has_integral_sub
content.prop: has_integral f k s & has_integral g l s --> has_integral (%x. f x - g x) (k - l) s

content.name: integral_0
content.prop: integral s (%x. 0) = 0

content.name: integral_add
content.prop: integrable_on f s & integrable_on g s --> integral s (%x. f x + g x) = integral s f + integral s g

content.name: integral_cmul
content.prop: integrable_on f s --> integral s (%x. c * (f x)) = c * integral s f

content.name: integral_neg
content.prop: integrable_on f s --> integral s (%x. -(f x)) = - integral s f

content.name: integral_sub
content.prop: integrable_on f s & integrable_on g s --> integral s (%x. f x - g x) = integral s f - integral s g

content.name: integrable_0
content.prop: integrable_on (%x. 0) s

content.name: integrable_add
content.prop: integrable_on f s & integrable_on g s --> integrable_on (%x. f x + g x) s

content.name: integrable_cmul
content.prop: integrable_on f s --> integrable_on (%x. c * (f x)) s

content.name: integrable_cmul_eq
content.prop: integrable_on (%x. c * (f x)) s = ((c = 0) | integrable_on f s)

content.name: integrable_neg
content.prop: integrable_on f s --> integrable_on (%x. -(f x)) s

content.name: integrable_neg_eq
content.prop: integrable_on (%x. -(f x)) s = integrable_on f s

content.name: integrable_sub
content.prop: integrable_on f s & integrable_on g s --> integrable_on (%x. f x - g x) s

content.name: has_integral_eq
content.prop: (!x. member x s --> f x = g x) & has_integral f k s --> has_integral g k s

content.name: integrable_eq
content.prop: (!x. member x s --> f x = g x) & integrable_on f s --> integrable_on g s

content.name: has_integral_eq_eq
content.prop: (!x. member x s --> f x = g x) --> (has_integral f k s = has_integral g k s)

content.name: has_integral_null
content.prop: (a = b) --> has_integral f 0 (real_closed_interval a b)

content.name: has_integral_null_eq
content.prop: (a = b) --> (has_integral f i (real_closed_interval a b) = (i = 0))

content.name: integral_null
content.prop: (a = b) --> integral (real_closed_interval a b) f = 0

content.name: integrable_on_null
content.prop: (a = b) --> integrable_on f (real_closed_interval a b)

content.name: has_integral_empty
content.prop: has_integral f 0 (empty_set:: real set)

content.name: has_integral_empty_eq
content.prop: has_integral f i (empty_set:: real set) = (i = 0)

content.name: integrable_on_empty
content.prop: integrable_on f (empty_set:: real set)

content.name: integral_empty
content.prop: integral (empty_set:: real set) f = 0

content.name: has_integral_refl
content.prop: has_integral f 0 (real_closed_interval a a)

content.name: integrable_on_refl
content.prop: integrable_on f (real_closed_interval a a)

content.name: integral_refl
content.prop: integral (real_closed_interval a a) f = 0

content.name: interval_split_l
content.prop: inter (real_closed_interval a b) {x. x <= c} = real_closed_interval a (min b c)
